Abstract: Belgacom needs scalable, reliable and cost-effective cloud solutions to serve the Belgian SMB market, ISVs and segments of the corporate cloud market. Belgacom’s Becloud vDatacenter builds upon Dacentec KSA’s Virtual Private Datacenter, a white-labeled, turnkey IaaS offering to enable these cloud solutions.
